kpi.name: M1006C212

kpi_info.title: RB SETUP FAIL FOR DC-HSDPA DUE TO UE NACK
kpi_info.use: The number of failed Radio Bearer setups/reconfigurations for DC-HSDPA due to UE responding with a failure message. Also M1006C193 is updated along with this counter if the radio bearer was not using HSDPA previously. UPDATED: When the UE responds with RRC: RADIO BEARER SETUP FAILURE, RRC: RADIO BEARER RECONFIGURATION FAILURE, RRC: PHYSICAL CHANNEL RECONFIGURATION FAILURE or RRC: TRANSPORT CHANNEL RECONFIGURATION FAILURE for DC-HSDPA establishment attempt.

kpi.kpi_alias: RB SETUP FAIL FOR DC-HSDPA DUE TO UE NACK
